page.title: 04Employment
page.content: A number of small business in Walkern - a coach company, soft drinks manufacturer dating from 1790 but now in difficulties, metal works, carpenter/joiner, concrete manufacturer, builder, village store etc.- provide some employment for those from inside & outside the area. Other businesses operating from Walkern - 3 public houses, butcher, hairdresser, garage, motoring school & a firm of architects - offer only very limited employment opportunities. The farmers these days are highly mechanised & employ very little labour. It is estimated that 78% of the working population leave the area every day, many to other parts of Herts. (Stevenage, Hitchin, St. Albans, Hertford) & a significant number commute to London from Stevenage.
